article_title: No Medical Reason To Ban Transgender Individuals From U.S. Military

article_metadata.description: The American Medical Association said there is no “medically valid reason” to exclude transgender individuals from the U.S. military. The new stand by the nation's largest doctor group, unanimously approved today by the AMA’s policy-making House of Delegates, comes amid changing policy by U.S. military branches toward transgender individuals and growing [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
